exits.Spirit Temple Boulder Room:
here(can_use(Bow) or can_use(Hookshot) or has_bombchus or
                (Bombs and logic_spirit_lower_adult_switch) or
                can_use(Slingshot) or can_use(Boomerang))
exits.Spirit Temple Compass Room:
here(can_use(Bow) or can_use(Hookshot) or has_bombchus or
                (Bombs and logic_spirit_lower_adult_switch) or
                can_use(Slingshot) or can_use(Boomerang))
exits.Spirit Temple First Mirror Room:
(not colossus_hands and not spirit_backdoor and
                    (Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 1)) or
                (Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 5)

exits.Spirit Temple Room02:
(Sticks or has_explosives or 
                    ((Nuts or Boomerang) and (Kokiri_Sword or Slingshot)))
exits.Spirit Temple Room03:
(Sticks or has_explosives or 
                    ((Nuts or Boomerang) and (Kokiri_Sword or Slingshot)))

region_name: Spirit Temple First Child Room Rear

exits.Spirit Temple Child Climb:
(not colossus_hands and not spirit_backdoor and
                    (Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 1)) or
                (Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 5)

exits.Spirit Temple Room03 Rear: Boomerang or Slingshot or (has_bombchus and logic_spirit_child_bombchu)

events.Spirit Temple Central Child Access:
has_explosives or (Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 3) or 
                    ((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 2) and bombchus_in_logic and not entrance_shuffle)

locations.Spirit Temple Child Climb North Chest:
can_use_projectile and (has_projectile(both) or
                    colossus_hands or spirit_backdoor or 
                    (is_adult and Spirit_Temple_Central_Child_Access) or 
                    (is_child and (Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 5)))
locations.Spirit Temple Child Climb East Chest:
can_use_projectile and (has_projectile(both) or
                    colossus_hands or spirit_backdoor or 
                    (is_adult and Spirit_Temple_Central_Child_Access) or 
                    (is_child and (Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 5)))
locations.Spirit Temple GS Sun on Floor Room:
can_use(Dins_Fire) or 
                (can_use_projectile and (has_projectile(both) or
                    colossus_hands or spirit_backdoor or 
                    (is_adult and Spirit_Temple_Central_Child_Access) or 
                    (is_child and (Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 5)))) or
                (can_take_damage and
                    (Sticks or Kokiri_Sword or has_projectile(child)) or
                    (is_adult and (colossus_hands or spirit_backdoor or
                        Spirit_Temple_Central_Child_Access)))

locations.Spirit Temple Map Chest:
((colossus_hands or spirit_backdoor or ((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 3) and is_adult)) and
                    (has_fire_source_with_torch or
                        (logic_spirit_map_chest and can_use(Bow)))) or
                (Spirit_Temple_Central_Child_Access and 
                    (can_use(Dins_Fire) or
                        (((Magic_Meter and Fire_Arrows) or logic_spirit_map_chest) and Bow and Sticks))) or 
                ((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 5) and has_explosives and 
                    can_use(Sticks))
locations.Spirit Temple GS Lobby:
(logic_spirit_lobby_gs and Boomerang and
                    (is_child and (colossus_hands or spirit_backdoor or
                        ((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 5) and has_explosives))) or
                    (Spirit_Temple_Central_Child_Access and 
                        (Progressive_Hookshot or Hover_Boots or logic_spirit_lobby_jump))) or
                (is_adult and (Progressive_Hookshot or Hover_Boots or logic_spirit_lobby_jump) and
                    (colossus_hands or spirit_backdoor or (Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 3)))

exits.Spirit Temple Silver Block Hall:
(Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 3) and at('Spirit Temple Statue Room East', 
                    can_use(Megaton_Hammer) and (Hover_Boots or logic_spirit_lobby_jump or
                    (Progressive_Hookshot and can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby))))

locations.Spirit Temple Statue Room Northeast Ches:
(Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 3) and can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby) and is_adult and 
                (Progressive_Hookshot or Hover_Boots or logic_spirit_lobby_jump)

locations.Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest:
((colossus_hands or spirit_backdoor or ((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 3) and is_adult)) and
                    (has_fire_source_with_torch or
                        (logic_spirit_sun_chest and can_use(Bow)))) or
                (Spirit_Temple_Central_Child_Access and 
                    (can_use(Dins_Fire) or
                        (((Magic_Meter and Fire_Arrows) or logic_spirit_sun_chest) and Bow and Sticks))) or 
                ((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 5) and has_explosives and
                    can_use(Sticks))

locations.Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Ro:
((colossus_hands or spirit_backdoor) and (can_use(Boomerang) or can_use(Hookshot))) or
                (has_explosives and Boomerang and Progressive_Hookshot) or 
                (can_use(Boomerang) and (Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 5) and has_explosives) or 
                (can_use(Hookshot) and ((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 3) or 
                    (Spirit_Temple_Central_Child_Access and Boomerang)))

exits.Desert Colossus:
not colossus_hands and
                ((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 5) or (is_adult and has_explosives))

locations.Spirit Temple Boss Key Chest:
(Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 5) and can_use(Hookshot) and
                    here(Bow or can_use(Slingshot))

exits.Spirit Temple Top Floor:
logic_spirit_wall or can_use(Longshot) or has_bombchus or 
                    ((Bombs or Nuts or can_use(Dins_Fire)) and 
                        (can_use(Bow) or can_use(Hookshot) or can_use(Megaton_Hammer) or
                        can_use(Slingshot) or can_use(Boomerang)))

exits.Spirit Temple Statue Room Ceiling: at('Spirit Temple Mirror Puzzle', can_use(Mirror_Shield) and has_explosives)
exits.Spirit Temple Mirror Puzzle: is_adult or Kokiri_Sword or Sticks or has_explosives
